description: This file implements the DownloadManagerHttpClient class, responsible for handling HTTP downloads using libcurl. It manages download initialization, progress tracking, and cleanup, and provides a method to download files with rate limiting and cancellation support.

classes.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient
classes.description: A class to manage HTTP file downloads, including progress tracking, rate limiting, and cancellation.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient()
methods.description: Constructor initializing cURL handle and class members.

methods.name: ~DownloadManagerHttpClient()
methods.description: Destructor cleaning up cURL handle and ensuring resource release.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient::Status downloadFile(const std::string & url,const std::string & fileName,uint32_t rateLimit)
methods.description: Performs the download of a file from a specified URL, saving it to a given filename with optional rate limiting.

methods.name: size_t progressCb(void * ptr,double dltotal,double dlnow,double ultotal,double ulnow)
methods.description: Static callback function to track download progress and handle cancellation.

methods.name: size_t write_data(void * ptr,size_t size,size_t nmemb,FILE * stream)
methods.description: Callback to write downloaded data to a file stream.

ctags.name: progressCb
ctags.pattern: /^size_t DownloadManagerHttpClient::progressCb(void *ptr, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ult/
